charinfo.name: Edo Tensei Senju Tobirama
charinfo.description: The second Hokage of the Hidden Leaf Village; Tobirama, a member of the Senju clan, puts the well being of the village and people above all else. Tobirama is a master of many jutsu, using both ninjutsu and genjutsu to stop the enemies in different ways.

abilities.name: Water Assault
abilities.description: Tobirama encases one enemy in water, making them ignore all helpful effects except chakra cost changes for 1 turn and dealing 15 damage to them.

abilities.name: Water Colliding Wave
abilities.description: Summoning a giant wave of water, Tobirama uses it to attack the enemy team for 3 turns, dealing 15 damage to them and stunning their affliction skills each turn. The following 3 turns, 'Water Assault' will deal an additional 15 damage*.

abilities.name: Bringer Of Darkness
abilities.description: Tobirama plunges the battlefield into darkness, making his team invulnerable to all harmful physical and mental skills for 1 turn.

abilities.name: Water Encampment Well
abilities.description: This skill makes ET Senju Tobirama invulnerable for 1 turn.
